channel.title: Get your music featured in my radio show!
channel.description: Hey guys, I own and host a radio show and lately I’ve been working on completely reinventing it and improving it however I can. We post an episode every month now so be sure to send in your demos to be featured in the May episode! Recently I’ve opened up a new service to take demos for the show. I’ve created a discord server where you can post your demos for the show and also connect with other artists to collab and get feedback. Eventually we will also have a section in the server where you can apply to become a guest dj for the show, but for the moment this isn’t available yet. Join the server and get featured in the show here! https://discord.gg/RNxmmaY

item.title: Get your music featured in my radio show!
item.dc:creator: NightOwl
item.description:
As for listener numbers to be totally honest I’m not 100% sure at the moment and I’ve been really inactive with this lately because some parts of it were getting difficult and I’ve also been working on improving it behind the scenes

Read full topic
item.source: Get your music featured in my radio show!

item.title: Get your music featured in my radio show!
item.dc:creator: NightOwl
item.description:
Of course I accept all genres! The only things I can’t accept are remixes, bootlegs, or mashups due to copyright

Read full topic

item.title: Get your music featured in my radio show!
item.dc:creator: NightOwl
item.description:
Hey guys, I own and host a radio show and lately I’ve been working on completely reinventing it and improving it however I can. We post an episode every month now so be sure to send in your demos to be featured in the May episode!
Recently I’ve opened up a new service to take demos for the show. I’ve created a discord server where you can post your demos for the show and also connect with other artists to collab and get feedback. Eventually we will also have a section in the server where you can apply to become a guest dj for the show, but for the moment this isn’t available yet.
Join the server and get featured in the show here!

Discord

Discord - Free voice and text chat for gamers

Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!
